user-authorized-key.title: User Authorized Key
user-authorized-key.description: SSH public key in order to connect to the SSH server of this instance.

enb_id.title: eNB ID
enb_id.description: eNB ID. (must be set if there are LTE cells)

gtp_addr.title: GTP Address
gtp_addr.description: IP address (and an optional port) on which the GTP-U packets are received. The default port is 2152

anyOf.title: Automatic address
anyOf.description: Automatic: based on MME / AMF list. IPv4 LAN: IPv4 on the ethernet LAN the eNB / gNB is connected to. Ipv6 Re6st address: acquired through the Re6st VPN software. Localhost address: for core networks running on the same machine. (default: Automatic)

gtp_payload_mtu.title: GTP Payload MTU
gtp_payload_mtu.description: Range 68 to 16384. MTU in bytes for the GTP-U payload. Do not forget to update the network interface MTU accordingly for optimal performance. For example with a GTP MTU of 1500 bytes, interface should have a MTU of at least 1564 bytes.

mbmsgw_addr.title: SGW Address
mbmsgw_addr.description: Set the IP address (and optional port) of the MBMS Gateway for the M2 connection. The default port is 36443.

mme_list.title: MME List
mme_list.description: List of MME to which the eNodeB is connected. (must be set if there are LTE cells)

name.title: (Optional) Neighbour Cell Name
name.description: Neighbour Cell name (for management purposes only)

mme_addr.title: MME Address
mme_addr.description: IP address (and optional port) of S1AP SCTP connection to the MME. The default port is 36412.

backup_mme_addr.title: Backup MME Address
backup_mme_addr.description: Defines the IP address (and optional port) of the backup MME to be used if the S1 connection is not established with the current MME. If the S1 connection is established, the backup MME will not be used. There must be a corresponding object for the backup MME in the mme_list array.

s1ap_bind_addr.title: S1AP Bind Address
s1ap_bind_addr.description: Optional String. IP address and optional port on which the S1AP SCTP connection is bound.

plmn_list.title: PLMN list (4G)
plmn_list.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the eNodeB, at most 6. (must be set if there are LTE cells)

attach_without_pdn.title: Attach Without PDN
attach_without_pdn.description: Optional boolean. Indicates if PLMN supports attach without PDN connectivity.

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: True if the cell is reserved for operator use.

gnb_id.title: gNB ID
gnb_id.description: gNB ID. (must be set if there are NR cells)

gnb_id_bits.title: gNB ID bits
gnb_id_bits.description: Number of bits for the gNodeB global identifier. (range 22 to 32)

amf_list.title: AMF list
amf_list.description: List of AMF to which the gNodeB is connected. (must be set if there are NR cells)

name.title: (Optional) Neighbour Cell Name
name.description: Neighbour Cell name (for management purposes only)

amf_addr.title: AMF Address
amf_addr.description: IP address (and optional port) of NGAP SCTP connection to the AMF. The default port is 38412.

backup_amf_addr.title: Backup AMF Address
backup_amf_addr.description: Defines the IP address (and optional port) of the backup AMF to be used if the NG connection is not established with the current AMF. If the NG connection is established, the backup AMF will not be used. There must be a corresponding object for the backup AMF in the amf_list array.

ngap_bind_addr.title: NGAP Bind Address
ngap_bind_addr.description: Optional string. IP address and optional port on which the NGAP SCTP connection is bound.

plmn_list_5g.title: PLMN list (5G)
plmn_list_5g.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the gNodeB, at most 12. (must be set if there are NR cells)

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: True if the cell is reserved for operator use.

handover_a1_rsrp.title: Handover A1 event RSRP threshold
handover_a1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm.

handover_a1_hysteresis.title: Handover A1 event hysteresis
handover_a1_hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A1 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

handover_a1_time_to_trigger.title: Handover A1 event time to trigger
handover_a1_time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A1 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

handover_a2_rsrp.title: Handover A2 event RSRP threshold
handover_a2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm.

handover_a2_hysteresis.title: Handover A2 event hysteresis
handover_a2_hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A2 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

handover_a2_time_to_trigger.title: Handover A2 event time to trigger
handover_a2_time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A2 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

a3_rsrp.title: Handover A3 event RSRP offset
a3_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP gain offset between eNBs and gNBs which will trigger handover

a4_rsrp.title: Handover A4 event RSRP threshold
a4_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm

a5_threshold1_rsrp.title: Handover A5 event RSRP threshold1
a5_threshold1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold1 value in dBm

a5_threshold2_rsrp.title: Handover A5 event RSRP threshold2
a5_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

hysteresis.title: EUTRA Handover hysteresis
hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A3/A4/A5 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

time_to_trigger.title: EUTRA Handover time to trigger
time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A3/A4/A5 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

b1_rsrp.title: Handover B1 event RSRP threshold

b2_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

a5_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A3/A4/A5 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

b2_threshold2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold2 value in dBm

handover_meas_gap_config.title: Handover measurement gap configuration
handover_meas_gap_config.description: Configuration of the measurement gap. Ignored if no neighbour cells are configured.

log_phy_debug.title: Physical layer log debug
log_phy_debug.description: Enable debug mode for physical layer logs

gps_sync.title: GPS synchronisation
gps_sync.description: True if GPS should be used for synchronisation

enb_stats_fetch_period.title: eNB/gNB statistics fetch period (seconds)
enb_stats_fetch_period.description: Describes how often a call to Amarisoft remote API is made to get eNB/gNB statistics

enb_drb_stats_enabled.title: Enable eNB/gNB drb statistics
enb_drb_stats_enabled.description: Enable eNB/gNB drb statistics through 100Hz polling, needed for E-UTRAN IP Throughput KPI

max_rx_sample_db.title: Maximum RX sample value (dB)
max_rx_sample_db.description: Maximum RX sample threshold above which RX saturated promise will fail

min_rxtx_delay.title: Minimum available time for radio front end processing (ms)
min_rxtx_delay.description: Baseband latency promise will fail if minimum TX/RX diff reaches threshold (lower than this value)

xlog_enabled.title: Enable eNB/gNB xlog
xlog_enabled.description: Enable eNB/gNB statistic collection (Needed for KPI computation)

xlog_forwarding_enabled.title: Enable eNB/gNB xlog forwarding
xlog_forwarding_enabled.description: Enable eNB/gNB xlog forwarding through fluentbit

check_core_network.title: Check all S1 and NG connections
check_core_network.description: check-core-network promise will fail if any S1 or NG connection is not setup

wendelin_telecom_software_release_url.title: Wendelin Telecom Software Release URL
wendelin_telecom_software_release_url.description: URL of the Wendelin Telecom Software Release to use to request a shared instance

xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding address
xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.description: Address of remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server to which Fluentbit should forward Xlog data

xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding port
xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.description: Port of remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server to which Fluentbit should forward Xlog data

xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.title: Fluentbit Xlog forwarding shared key
xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.description: Secret key shared with remote Fluentd or Fluentbit server for authentication when forwarding Xlog data

websocket_url_ipv6.title: Websocket URL IPv6
websocket_url_ipv6.description: Use IPv6 for the websocket URL

time_to_trigger.title: Handover A1 event time to trigger
time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A1 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.
